column4: usually, at some point you just switch your sources.list to the next version and do an update && dist-upgrade to keep following the latest
i'm running edgy right now... just did a s/dapper/edgy on my sources.list
is there a way to do that without having to modify your sources.list file every time a new release is made?
not that i know of. i've been doing that for the past 3 releases.  keeps you on the bleeding edge but i don't know if there's just one name like "testing" that you can use. i don't think so
